name: SNUSE 221
description: Hey. My name is *&#!$.<br/>Today I will tell you a little story of my life.<br/>I will tell about my fears, experiences. You will see many beautiful places I visited.<br/>You will have to solve many mysteries and secrets that are in my subconscious.<br/><br/>In the game SNUSE a small number of locations, but each of them is done in its own way well.<br/>In the game SNUSE a good soundtrack due to which a feeling of complete immersion appears.<br/>There is no text in the game, this decision was made to create a feeling of complete immersion in the game.<br/><br/>The game has terrible moments, this is not recommended for players under 16 years of age, pregnant women, and people with epilepsy.<br/><br/>Thank you for your attention, good game.
